summary: A story that revolves around drug abuse in the affluent north Indian State of Punjab and how the youth there have succumbed to it en-masse resulting in a socio-economic decline.
cast: Shahid Kapoor|Alia Bhatt|Kareena Kapoor|Diljit Dosanjh|Satish Kaushik|Manav Vij|Vansh Bhardwaj|Suhail Nayyar|Prabhjyot Singh|Rajesh Kumar Sharma|Kamal Tiwari|Mahabir Bhullar|Suvinder Vicky|Dilawar Sidhu|Lovely Sidhu|Vishu Sharma|Harpreet Singh|Gurpreet Toti|Ikhattar Singh|Pargat Singh|Gaurav Sharma|Zeeshan Balouch|Geetangali Singh|Amar Chaudhary|Sukh Kunwar|Harrdy Sandhu|Annastasia Hamulka|Kaizaad Kotwal|Vishal Handa|Pawan Singh|Ishaan Khattar|Aaradhna Uppal|Satwant Kaur|Anita Shabdeesh|Satpal Singh|Nina Tiwana|Swairaj Sandhu|Ravi Aneja|Sandeep Jit Pateela|Madhumita Barik|Mayahans Nath|Narinder Nina|Mahinder Pal Singh|Taran Bajaj|Varnesh Sharma|Vikas Joshi|Rahi|Gaura Smith|Varun Arya|Kishore Sharma|Pradeep Singh|Amandeep Singh|Sukhdev Singh|Bhawsheel Sahni|Jaswant Daman|Binny Singh|Abishek Chandana|Abishek Arora|Shubham Kumar|Lakhwinder Pal Singh|Satnam Singh|Jasbir Chingiria|Lakha Lehri|Mani Kular|Manpreet Singh|Vikram Chouhan|Satyajeet Rajput|Sukhvinder Saini|Sikhander Tripathi|Abreet Pal|Kanwar Pal Singh|Randhir|Simardeep Singh|Kuldeep Singh Sran|Shivender Sharma|Robin Toor|Dr. Kurundeep Singh|Bhavya Khanna|Gourish Khanna|Ashok|Bhatt|Bharat Bhushan|Rajender Chaudhary|Anna Ador|Arvinder Bhatti|Mansi Jhingran|Pawan Singh
title: Udta Punjab
